betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Running your Dimensionally Transcendent Plasma Forge for a very long time [note](8 hours)[/note] allows for the Multidimensional Spaces to be perfectly aligned.

With your newly acquired tech, you can finally tap into these spaces in perfect sync, allowing you to run your plasma forges at incredible speeds.

The Transdimensional Alignment Matrix allows for the DTPF to run with §aPerfect Overclocks§r. You need to have a full discount for the Overclocks to occur, and the extra power cost is instead alleviated with more of the §l§6§r§l§asame§r §rcatalyst.

[note]This is extremely power and catalyst hungry. You can try upgrading all of your DTPFs if you want. But the recommendation is to use them on the slow recipes that you forge passively.

You have to specify the catalyst in the GUI by right clicking the Convergence button. It has to be the same as the recipe being run.[/note]

[warn]The Fuel Discount will decay 100x faster[/warn]
